0.speaker: Gale
0.text: I've always felt flames to be a rather perfect expression of love, Karlach.
0.context: NodeContext: Romantic, indulging in the poetry of the image

2.speaker: Gale
2.text: Passionate, primal, capable of bestowing the most life-affirming comfort, or inflicting the profoundest damage.
2.context: NodeContext: Listing the qualities of fire. Romantic, indulging in the poetry of the image

1.speaker: Karlach
1.text: That's... pretty nice. Never thought about it like that. But now I will.
